meanings.definition: A male ruler of a country or territory.
meanings.sent1: The kings of old ruled their lands with wisdom and strength.
meanings.sent2: In the game of chess, the kings are the most important pieces.
meanings.sent3: The king's crown was too big for his head, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: He was the king of the playground, always leading the games and adventures.
meanings.sent5: The image of the king sitting on his throne was etched in their minds forever.

meanings.definition: A playing card bearing a representation of a king.
meanings.sent1: I drew the kings from the deck and laid them out on the table.
meanings.sent2: The poker player's hand held three kings, almost guaranteeing a win.
meanings.sent3: The king in the deck seemed to wink at me, as if knowing the game's outcome.
meanings.sent4: She played her king card at just the right moment, surprising everyone at the table.
meanings.sent5: The image of the king on the card was beautifully detailed, with intricate designs.

meanings.definition: A person or thing regarded as the finest or most important in its sphere.
meanings.sent1: Among chefs, she was known as the king of desserts for her amazing creations.
meanings.sent2: The lion, known as the king of the jungle, roared mightily to assert his dominance.
meanings.sent3: The king of the office coffee machine was always the one who refilled it first.
meanings.sent4: She was the undisputed king of the dance floor, moving with grace and confidence.
meanings.sent5: The mountain stood tall and proud, like the king of all the surrounding peaks.
